Trouble arrives in measures,
;and we stack it up real high,
;until we're convinced,
;we have no reason to try.
;If you feel defeated,
;you're absolutely wrong,
;for if you follow your dream,
;you could never lose for long.
;Ignore the minor set-backs
;that pile up and trouble you,
;or you will build a mountain,
;out of the stones hurled at you.
;The future holds great promise,
;your destiny unknown,
;but God is always helping,
;and you're never alone.
;Soar bravely toward your goal.
;Let nothing darken the way.
;You can change your tomorrow,
;if you seek your dream today.

Some people won't believe in you;
;they won't encourage you
;to follow your dreams,
;but you must always believe in you,
;no matter how long the journey
;ahead seems.
;
;Some people will be jealous of you;
;their words will be sharp and unkind,
;but you must close your ears
;to such words,
;and never allow them to change
;your direction or your mind.
;
;I'll always believe in you
;and encourage you
;to follow your dreams,
;and I'll try my best to show you
;that the road is never
;as long as it seems.
;
;I'll always cheer for you;
;my words will be warm and kind,
;because I truly treasure you.
;You own a part of my heart,
;and you're always on my mind.
